text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct version 2021
    CodeDisplay
    35303009Benign essential hypertension complicating AND/OR reason for care during puerperium (disorder)
    19769006High-renin essential hypertension (disorder)
    71874008Benign essential hypertension complicating AND/OR reason for care during childbirth (disorder)
    1201005Benign essential hypertension (disorder)
    46481004Low-renin essential hypertension (disorder)
    40511000119107Postpartum pre-existing essential hypertension (disorder)
    23717007Benign essential hypertension complicating AND/OR reason for care during pregnancy (disorder)
    63287004Benign essential hypertension in obstetric context (disorder)
    9901000Essential hypertension complicating AND/OR reason for care during puerperium (disorder)
    429457004Systolic essential hypertension (disorder)
    59621000Essential hypertension (disorder)
    72022006Essential hypertension in obstetric context (disorder)
    78808002Essential hypertension complicating AND/OR reason for care during pregnancy (disorder)
    371125006Labile essential hypertension (disorder)
    18416000Essential hypertension complicating AND/OR reason for care during childbirth (disorder)
    78975002Malignant essential hypertension (disorder)
  • Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/icd-10-cm version 2022
    CodeDisplay
    I15.0Renovascular hypertension
    I15.2Hypertension secondary to endocrine disorders
    I15.9Secondary hypertension, unspecified
    I15.1Hypertension secondary to other renal disorders
    I10Essential (primary) hypertension
    I15.8Other secondary hypertension
    I15Secondary hypertension
